name: ghost-kraken
description: Kraken tests for Ghost 3.41.1 local instance

scripts.start-kk: npm run test-kk && npm run report-kk
scripts.start-cy: npm run test-cy && npm run report-cy
scripts.test-cy: npm run cy-run && mkdir screenshots && mv cypress/screenshots screenshots/cypress
scripts.clean: rm -rf screenshots reports .kraken && npm run clean-report
scripts.start-containers: npm run rs-gh3 && npm run rs-gh4 && sleep 5
scripts.rs-gh3: docker exec ghost_3.41.1 rm /var/lib/ghost/content/data/ghost.db && docker restart ghost_3.41.1
scripts.rs-gh4: docker exec ghost_4.44.0 rm /var/lib/ghost/content/data/ghost.db && docker restart ghost_4.44.0
scripts.cy-run: npm run start-containers && cypress run --headless && rm -rf cypress/videos
scripts.appr-ref: npx backstop test || npx backstop approve
scripts.gen-ref-kk: node genJSON.js Kraken http://localhost:8080 screenshots/kraken/ghost-3.41.1 screenshots/kraken/ghost-3.41.1 0.2
scripts.gen-new-kk: node genJSON.js Kraken http://localhost:8080 screenshots/kraken/ghost-3.41.1 screenshots/kraken/ghost-4.44.0 0.2
scripts.gen-ref-cy: node genJSON.js Cypress http://localhost:8080 screenshots/cypress/ghost-3.41.1.js screenshots/cypress/ghost-3.41.1.js 0.2
scripts.gen-new-cy: node genJSON.js Cypress http://localhost:8080 screenshots/cypress/ghost-3.41.1.js screenshots/cypress/ghost-4.44.0.js 0.2
scripts.report-kk: npm run clean-report && npm run gen-ref-kk && npm run appr-ref && npm run gen-new-kk && npx backstop test
scripts.report-cy: npm run clean-report && npm run gen-ref-cy && npm run appr-ref && npm run gen-new-cy && npx backstop test

author: Luis Miguel Guzman Perez
